tool_description: Logs and tracks user login attempts with detailed information for security monitoring and audit purposes.

username_or_email.description: Username or email used in login attempt

ip_address.description: IP address of the login attempt

attempt_result.description: Result: success, failed_password, failed_mfa, account_locked, or account_disabled

error_messages: Invalid attempt result: Result must be one of [success, failed_password, failed_mfa, account_locked, account_disabled]
Invalid IP address: Provide a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address
Missing required fields: username_or_email, ip_address, user_agent, and attempt_result are required
usage: Log each login attempt with user identifier, IP address, device information, and attempt result.

log_entry_id.description: Unique identifier for this log entry

risk_score.description: Calculated risk score (0-100) for this attempt

suspicious_indicators.description: List of suspicious activity indicators detected
